name: DO(N'T) DIE
description:
Created for the GMTK Jam, DO(N'T) DIE is a game all about mechanics doing multiple things.

Build your MULTI Counter as high as you dare by crushing enemies! The higher your MULTI, the higher your score earned per kill! But how far do you go? The higher your MULTI, the faster enemies appear, but the more points you earn when you DIE!

Just be careful not to die before you have a MULTI, or you get nothing!

NOTE TO GMTKJAM JUDGES:

* Music Credits: "Ideetje Extended" by RoccoW of FreeMusicArchive.org

* All other assets were hand-made in the 48 hour period.
